content: Duke Vratislav gives Ječmínek a beautifully crafted sword with intricate details as a gift. Ječmínek is incredibly grateful and expresses his appreciation for the craftsmanship of the sword. When Duke Vratislav asks him if he wants more gold, Ječmínek graciously declines the offer and expresses his contentment with the gift. Ječmínek also promises to use the sword wisely and ensure that it serves its purpose of protecting the people and keeping peace in their land.
